root: ^Residence of the witches: Glynda, Margelenie, Solarys, Mynerva and Deluna.

^The witches return to their mansion after a long day of hunting for ingredients. One, Deluna, found their concoctions useless and a waste of her abilities. She storms off into the upperfloors, telling her sisters to leave her undisturbed.

^They told her…seeking everlasting live came at a price. Apparently, she didn’t know self-sacrifice was that price. With a thud and scream, they knew nothing but a Wraith remained. Now the halls of the Coven are haunted by one of their own, Deluna, and only they held the means to stop her.
